nodes.text: Jabba's bunker was a secret location maintained by Jabba the Hutt in the Swallowing Wastes. Aboveground the bunker was an egg-shaped structure, but extended into an underground complex. A camouflaged hangar in the nearby mountains housed at least six Z-95 Headhunters. Shortly after Jabba's death, Swang and his swoop gang took control of the bunker.
